long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension for Digital Nomads and Remote Workers.

Transform your next Airbnb stay into a productive workspace with this extension. 

Easily find accommodations that offer 24” desktop monitors, ensuring you can work efficiently from anywhere.

Features:

Search and Identify:
Quickly locate Airbnb listings with 24” desktop monitors using our intuitive interface.

Free Monitor Delivery:
We request a desktop monitor and stand delivered to your Airbnb at no extra cost.

Availability Guide:

	•	Green Icon: Accommodation includes a 24” monitor and stand.
	•	Blue Icon: Host provides a monitor for long stays (e.g., 6 weeks).
	•	Red Icon: Host does not provide a monitor.
	•	Purple Icon: Awaiting host response.
	•	Yellow Icon: Unavailable for monitor requests.

Easy Host Communication:
Send pre-written messages to hosts to enjoy the pre-made deal of getting 24” desktop monitor and stand before booking.

Need Assistance?
If no monitor deals are available for your selected area or dates, email me your search url at antoine.chrrr@gmail.com. I will find deals for you, and they will appear in the extension once arranged.

Privacy & Security:
Your booking preferences and communications are securely handled. Data is used solely to enhance your experience.

Support:
Contact me at antoine.chrrr@gmail.com for assistance.

More Information:
By installing our extension, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
